## Events

| Event            | Description                                                                                 | Type                          |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| `screenSelected` | When a screen gets selected from the dropdown, this event emits selected screen information | `CustomEvent<ScreenSettings>` |
